## First Visualization

The purpose of this visualization is to highlight the potential relationship between geographical locations and the average SAT performace. Using map visualization, we can get a better insight on location vs. SAT performance. Here is the visualization:

```{r, echo=F, warning=F}
map_gen()
```
From the map visualization we can see there seems to be a higher percentage of student passing the performance benchmark near San Francisco and Sacramento than other places. Student near Fresno seems to have lower performance than others.
